item.description:
Kind of a last minute impulse opportunity. A few of us are going to see this new and provocative documentary about a man's quest for answers tomorrow evening, which is $5 movie Tuesday night.

Director Tom Shadyac speaks with intellectual and spiritual leaders about what's wrong with our world and how we can improve both it and the way we live in it.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1741225/

Please join us if you'd like, the movie starts at 7:30pm and we'd like to get in a bit early and get good seats. Hope to see you there.


Best wishes,

Tom and Deena, Organizers
Portland Mindfulness Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: We're meeting in front of the Nick @ 7:15pm
item.name: Moving Night Out: I Am
